# Main

## Katherine Goode {#title}

### Statistician

I am a statistician with research interests in model assessment, explainability of machine learning algorithms, data visualization, random forest models, and R package development. My PhD dissertation is [Visual diagnostics for explaining machine learning models](https://dr.lib.iastate.edu/items/abac51d2-c05b-4ef2-90f5-03740ff5c682).
